Stellar Rotation¶

Functions to calculate rotational parameters for groups containing gas or star particles.

Functions:¶

stellar_rotation.add_rotation_curves(filename, snapnum, group='Stars')[source]¶

wrapper function

stellar_rotation.add_rotation_curves_gas(filename, snapnum, group='Stars')[source]¶

wrapper function - gas verison!!!!!!!! calculates for gas!!

stellar_rotation.calc_stellar_rotation(starMass_inGroup, starVel_inGroup, starPos_inGroup, groupPos, groupVelocity, boxSize, boxSizeVel)[source]¶

Calculate rotation curve of stellar component - 25 steps

stellar_rotation.get_gasIDs(f)[source]¶

Get particle IDs (groupordered snap)

stellar_rotation.iterate_galaxies(atime, boxSize, halo100_indices, allStarMasses, allStarPositions, allStarVelocities, startAllStars, endAllStars, groupRadii, groupPos, groupVelocities)[source]¶

iterate all the galaxies in the FOF and find their rotation curves. Perform all the unit conversions.

process-fof
